name: Kaihi
description:
Are you hungry for some one-­tap action?

Feed your craving with KAIHI!

Dodge the hungry jaws, avoid the crazy blinking eyes
and collect coins to unlock all the cute onigiri.

Simply tap to dodge. Sounds easy right? See you on the leaderboard.

KAIHI is a fun arcade game featuring:

• 5 tasty characters
• Power ups
• Compete against your friends with 2 leaderboards
• Accessible controls
• Cute art
• Awesome original music
• Serious one-tap action
• iCloud Save - sync to all you favourite Apple devices
• Localised to 6 languages (more coming soon)

Please rate this game and if you have any comments I would love to hear them.

KAIHI is a free game supported by ads.

The Privacy Policy can be found on the following link: http://privacy.deadjam.co.uk/

Thanks for playing!
